channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Also I'm New At Coding On Servers.
And I Need Help To Change The Highest Combat Level And Skill Level I Really Hope Someone Here Can Help Me ;)

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

[quote=“lucana, post:4, topic:326808”]Thats easy

in client.java search

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

under that you will see

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= ###; lvl++) {
  points += Math.floor(
      (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
  output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
  if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
  }
}
return 110;

}[/code]

change ### to the thing u want[/quote] tyvm

Read full topic

      (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
  output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
